name: Comfort Village
description:
For our last Level Design project, we are using the Greenwood Fantasy Village asset pack and creating our own village. I also used the LowPoly Medieval Constructions asset pack to decorate the interior of the houses.

Music by:

Matthew Pablo

http://www.matthewpablo.com

Alex Smith

Music by The Cynic Project (cynicmusic.com)

Stefan_Composer

Peaceful Village | OpenGameArt.org

Antoinemax

Nature Sounds Pack | OpenGameArt.org
